question: My PC is turned on, but the monitor shows nothing. What can I do?
answer: Check if the VGA cable at the back of the CPU is connected properly. Disconnect and reconnect the cable

question: My Keyboard is not working. Help!
answer: Check if your keyboard is probably plugged into the USB cable. Try connecting it to other cables. Raise a ticket if the problem persists

question: My PC is running slow and everything is lagging. What could be wrong?
answer: Press Ctlr + Alt + Delete and open up the task manager. Take a screenshot of the processes and submit this along with a ticket.

question: My PC does not work. Can I get a better one so I can complete my work?
My monitor is displaying a countdown timer and my CPU is beeping. Am I in any danger?
